mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alba ( AL_ID, AL_NAME, AL_AGE, AL_ZIP, AL_ADD1, AL_ADD2, AL_HP, GR_CODE, AL_GEN, AL_MAIL ) VALUES ( #{alId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alAge,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{alZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alAdd1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alAdd2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alHp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alGen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
